translations: n.蜂巢，蜂房（hive 的复数）；[皮肤]荨麻疹；假膜性喉头炎
v.使（蜜蜂）入蜂箱（hive 的第三人称单数）
n.（Hives）人名；（匈）希韦什；（英）海夫斯

sentences.sentence: Glass hives offer a close-up view of the bees at work, with the queen bee in each hive marked by a white dot.
sentences.translation: 玻璃蜂房可以近距离观察工作中的蜜蜂，每个蜂房的蜂王都被打上白点标记。

sentences.sentence: If you're helping out with the bee hives, pay attention.
sentences.translation: 如果你要在蜂房这里帮忙，就要注意了。

sentences.sentence: I switched to traditional medicine and all the hives disappeared, together with my itching.
sentences.translation: 我转而服用传统药物，我的荨麻疹和瘙痒都消失了。
